headline: U.S. oil stocks explode after Trump’s actions, comments on Venezuela
summary: Investing.com -- Oil stocks rose sharply on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump said Venezuela’s removal from Nicolas Maduro’s rule could unlock access to the country’s massive oil resources, potentially altering global energy dynamics.

headline: Baker Hughes Closes Sale of Precision, Sensors & Instrumentation Product Line to Crane Company
summary: Transaction strengthens balance sheet and liquidity with cash proceeds of $1.15 billion before customary closing adjustments HOUSTON and LONDON, Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR, “the Company”), an energy technology company, announced Monday the successful closing of the sale of its Precision Sensors & Instrumentation (PSI) product line to Crane Company (NYSE: CR, “Crane”). PSI includes the Druck, Panametrics and Reuter-Stokes brands, and the Company had announced the

content.title: Baker Hughes Closes Sale of Precision, Sensors & Instrumentation Product Line to Crane Company

PSI includes the Druck, Panametrics and Reuter-Stokes brands, and the Company had announced the

headline: Crane Company Completes Acquisition of Precision Sensors & Instrumentation and Announces Date for Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Teleconference
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., January 05, 2026--Crane Company (NYSE:CR) ("Crane" or the "Company"), a premier industrial manufacturing and technology company, today announced that it has closed on the previously announced acquisition of Precision Sensors & Instrumentation ("PSI"), a leading provider of sensor-based technologies for aerospace, nuclear and process industries, from Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR).

content.title: Crane Company Completes Acquisition of Precision Sensors & Instrumentation and Announces Date for Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Teleconference
content.summary: STAMFORD, Conn., January 05, 2026--Crane Company (NYSE:CR) ("Crane" or the "Company"), a premier industrial manufacturing and technology company, today announced that it has closed on the previously announced acquisition of Precision Sensors & Instrumentation ("PSI"), a leading provider of sensor-based technologies for aerospace, nuclear and process industries, from Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR).

headline: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise Premarket
summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies surged premarket after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela's crude production. Among the big gainers was Chevron, up around 8% ahead of Monday's open.

headline: Trump's Maduro ousting: Oil prices tick higher, oil stocks rally
summary: Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) are up only slightly after US President Trump ousted Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Oil companies, like Chevron (CVX), SLB Limited (SLB), and Halliburton (HAL), are rallying on the news. Yahoo Finance Breaking News Reporter Jake Conley joins Morning Brief to discuss the moves in the oil market and energy companies. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Trump's Maduro ousting: Oil prices tick higher, oil stocks rally
content.description:
Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) are up only slightly after US President Trump ousted Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Oil companies, like Chevron (CVX), SLB Limited (SLB), and Halliburton (HAL), are rallying on the news.

Yahoo Finance Breaking News Reporter Jake Conley joins Morning Brief to discuss the moves in the oil market and energy companies.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise
summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies rallied after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela’s crude production.  Among the big gainers was Chevron, up more than 4%.  The company is the sole remaining U.S. oil major in Venezuela.

content.title: U.S. Energy Company Shares Rise
content.summary: Shares in U.S. energy companies rallied after President Trump pledged to dispatch American drillers to revive Venezuela’s crude production.  Among the big gainers was Chevron, up more than 4%.  The company is the sole remaining U.S. oil major in Venezuela.

headline: Stocks Jump After U.S. Captures Venezuela’s Maduro
summary: MARKETS MAIN  Energy and defense stocks rose after the U.S. ousted Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro, and President Trump pledged American drillers would revive the country’s crude production. The moves helped boost indexes, as did surges in growth stocks such as Tesla, Amazon and Palantir.

content.title: Stocks Jump After U.S. Captures Venezuela’s Maduro
content.summary: MARKETS MAIN  Energy and defense stocks rose after the U.S. ousted Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro, and President Trump pledged American drillers would revive the country’s crude production. The moves helped boost indexes, as did surges in growth stocks such as Tesla, Amazon and Palantir.
